jobs.title: Telesales Executive - Remote working
jobs.description:
We are currently looking for a Telesales Executive.
Candidate must be well spoken, hard working, self motivated and a good communicator.
The role allows you to work from home so must have a laptop/pc with good internet connection.  
Must be Native/Fluent English speaking, both spoken and written  
  
RESPONSIBILITIES
You will be representing the company as first or second point of contact, and required to generate a constant flow of new business.  

WORK EXPERIENCE AND SKILLS
Experience in cold/warm calling leads.  
Exceptional customer service skills, overcoming objections and building rapport with clients.  

This is a self employed role working from home. 
High Commissions and Bonus structure.
Some basic available.
Product training and all data supplied.
Ongoing training and daily support provided.
